option.name: updatedContent
option.value:
# 견적 문의 구글폼 URL NEXT_PUBLIC_QUOTE_FORM_URL=https://forms.gle/your-google-form-id
# 카카오톡 채널 URL NEXT_PUBLIC_KAKAO_CHANNEL_URL=https://pf.kakao.com/_your_channel
# Google Tag Manager ID (선택사항) NEXT_PUBLIC_GTM_ID=GTM-XXXXXXX
# Google Analytics 4 ID (선택사항) NEXT_PUBLIC_GA_ID=G-XXXXXXXXXX
